name: Dark Forest (itch) (Ryan Wilson)
description:
Dark Forest is a first-person survival horror game where the player must collect ammo and resources while surviving a Zombie threat. Players can swap seamlessly between three different weapons to defend themselves against the horde while searching for battery packs and ammo.  Can you survive the Dark Forest?

This game is based on the " Zombie Runner" prototype found in the gamedev.tv C# Unity Game Developer 3D course by Gamedev.tv.
